getTarsFilter: (TAR_Requester eq {USER_ID} or TAR_Traveller eq {USER_ID}) and ((TAR_BudgetApprovalStatus ne 'Approved' and TAR_BudgetApprovalStatus ne 'Rejected') and ((TAR_RequiresGssApproval eq 1 and (TAR_GSSApprovalStatus ne 'Approved' and TAR_GSSApprovalStatus ne 'Rejected')) or (TAR_RequiresGssApproval eq 0)))
getHistoryTars: (TAR_Requester eq {USER_ID} or TAR_Traveller eq {USER_ID} or TAR_LineManager eq {USER_ID} or TAR_TravelCoordinator eq {USER_ID} or TAR_BudgetApprover eq {USER_ID} or TAR_AdditionalStaffMember eq {USER_ID})
